game.name: Holey
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 생물학적 종말 이후, 생존자들은 신비한 생물에 의해 보호받는 차고에 몸을 숨깁니다. 이 1인칭 협동 공포 루터 게임에서 밖으로 나가 연료를 모으고, 괴물을 먹이며, 멀리 떨어진 라디오 탑까지 싸워 나아가세요
game.shortDescriptionEn: After a biological apocalypse, survivors take refuge in a garage protected by a mysterious creature. Venture out, gather fuel, feed the beast, and fight your way to a distant radio tower in this first-person co-op horror looter
